original_title: Maximum retail price for eggs by weight announced
original_body_lines: An extraordinary gazette notification (2328/05) was issued yesterday announcing the maximum retail price for eggs by weight.

The Consumer Affairs Authority (CAA) orders that no manufacturer, producer, supplier, distributor or trader shall sell, supply, expose, offer for sale or display for sale the item listed below at a price exceeding the maximum retail price.
Accordingly, the maximum retail price of white eggs will be Rs. 880 per kilo and brown eggs will be Rs. 920 per kilo.
The above prices will come into effect today (April 20). (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
